last_episode_to_air.name: Bheem’s Snow Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: On a snowy winter day, Bheem helps a jolly visitor out of a tough spot — and learns that dreams really can come true.

name: Mighty Little Bheem
overview: An innocent toddler’s boundless curiosity -- and extraordinary might -- lead to mischief and adventure in his small Indian town.

episodes.name: A Flower for Mom
episodes.overview: All Bheem wants to do is chase a flower in the woods, but can he grab it before a hungry lion gets him?

episodes.name: Dancing Bheem
episodes.overview: When a dance show comes to town, Bheem can’t help but move to the music and make his way to center stage!

episodes.name: Spicy Surprise
episodes.overview: Bheem’s new playmate is twice his size, but he's jealous that Bheem is stronger -- and he plans a nasty prank.

episodes.name: Honey Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem loves his first taste of honey, and so does his friend. Do the bees have enough for them both?

episodes.name: Mighty Hiccups
episodes.overview: When Bheem gets the hiccups, he and his monkey friend have a forest adventure to get rid of them.

episodes.name: Bheem's Blanket
episodes.overview: When Bheem’s blanket is used to steal a carriage, he takes the ride of his life to hunt down the thief.

episodes.name: Mighty Muscles
episodes.overview: A strongman amazes the town with his feats. How will he feel when Bheem easily upstages him?

episodes.name: A Babysitter's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Bheem’s new babysitter has many plans for playtime, but his animal friends may be too much for her!

episodes.name: Come Out and Play
episodes.overview: When Bheem and his buddy sneak out to play with a friendly elephant, things get very messy, very quickly!

episodes.name: Follow the Laddoos
episodes.overview: While Mom’s away, Bheem spies a trayful of his favorite laddoos. Will he get to them before she’s home?

episodes.name: Dirty Little Piggie
episodes.overview: Mom wants Bheem to bathe, but he has other things to do -- like keeping a pig from eating his snacks!

episodes.name: Mister Joker
episodes.overview: Inspired by the clown in town, Bheem is all too excited to try some impressive tricks of his own.

episodes.name: The King's Crown
episodes.overview: A thief has stolen the king’s crown, but Bheem won’t make it so easy for him to get away with it!

episodes.name: Bheem with a Beat
episodes.overview: Bheem’s new drum set is way too loud. But when Mom takes it away, he finds other ways to make music.

episodes.name: Mango Run
episodes.overview: Bheem and his pal get spotted by a hungry lion -- but Bheem has some funny ways to fend him off!

episodes.name: Doctor Bheem
episodes.overview: After a health checkup, Bheem wants to be a doctor himself. His patients? His animal pals, of course!

episodes.name: The Green Ball
episodes.overview: Bheem searches for his green ball in the woods, but what he finds is quite different from what he lost.

episodes.name: Gardening with Bheem
episodes.overview: While trying to help their mothers in the garden, Bheem and his friend stir up some innocent mischief.

episodes.name: Red Balloon
episodes.overview: Separated from Mom at the fair, Bheem keeps busy chasing balloons, enjoying laddoos and playing games.

episodes.name: A Big Ball of Yarn
episodes.overview: When a big ball of yarn creates havoc at home, will Bheem and his friend get tangled up in the mess?

episodes.name: Hats Off to Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem finds a hat. But before he can claim it, he must face some tough competitors who want it, too.

episodes.name: Painting with Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem begins monkeying around with mom's paint. But will it lead to a colorful mess -- or a work of art?

episodes.name: Mistaken Identities
episodes.overview: When Bheem is mistaken for a princess and kidnapped, he uses some tricks of his own to escape!

episodes.name: Birdie Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem may not have wings, but he's in for a sky-high adventure when he encounters three eggs in a bird's nest.

episodes.name: The Swamp Thing
episodes.overview: A tumble into a swamp leaves Bheem covered in mud. Now a hunter thinks he's an exotic creature and wants to catch him!

episodes.name: The Lost Pup
episodes.overview: Titli is looking for her furry sidekick. But can Bheem help her find him before he gets to Mom's laundry.

episodes.name: Busy As A Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem's out to retrieve Mom's precious necklace from a cheeky monkey -- and the job is anything but simple.

episodes.name: Rice Rice Baby
episodes.overview: Mom wants Bheem to wait with the babysitter while she shops for rice. But he's hardly one to sit for long!

episodes.name: Sticky Bheem
episodes.overview: Bheem's love for gooey treat gets him -- and a four-legged friend -- into quite the sticky situation.

episodes.name: Bheem Meets Bunty
episodes.overview: The small woodland animals don't want to play with Bunty, the big elephant. Can Bheem help them all be friends?

episodes.name: Kalia's Wagon Ride
episodes.overview: When Kalia gets a new wagon, Bheem takes him for a heart-pounding ride that neither of them will soon forget.

episodes.name: Disappearing Bheem
episodes.overview: When Bheem unexpectedly becomes a part of a magician's act, he adds a bit of his own chaos and comedy to the show.

episodes.name: Diaper Disaster
episodes.overview: Bheem must get creative to take his diaper back from a mischievous monkey, who won't return it so easily!

episodes.name: Kalia's Creepy Shed
episodes.overview: The toys and tricks inside a dark shed have Kalia terrified, but Bheem's having the time of his life!

episodes.name: Twin Trouble
episodes.overview: It's double trouble for Bheem when his doll gets swiped by a pair of twins. But can he show them how to share?

episodes.name: Bear Hug
episodes.overview: A mean hunter is out to capture a friendly bear -- unless Bheem can step in with his super strength!

episodes.name: Kalia's Birthday
episodes.overview: It's his buddy's birthday party, but Bheem has trouble parting with a gift he wants to keep for himself.

episodes.name: Bheem's Baby Owl
episodes.overview: Bheem's on a mission to help a young owl get safely back to his nest -- and his strategies are a hoot!

episodes.name: Bheem's Sick Day
episodes.overview: With everyone fussing over Bheem, who's sick in bed, an envious Kalia tries to attract some attention.

episodes.name: Let's Be Friends
episodes.overview: A big bully has intimidated all the kids. But does he really stand a chance against the ever-friendly Bheem?

episodes.name: Titli's Cooking Day
episodes.overview: Bheem and Kalia can't wait to taste what Titli's cooking up -- but will the wait be worth it in the end?

episodes.name: Caterpillar's Day Out
episodes.overview: Bheem is fascinated by a young caterpillar but must rescue it from becoming a hungry bird's lunch.

episodes.name: Bheem of Light
episodes.overview: Sleeping in the dark can be scary for Bheem. Can he create a night light that will calm all his fears?

episodes.name: Off On A Ride
episodes.overview: An evil bandit is scheming to capture a horse, but Bheem -- and an angry cow -- won't make it easy!

episodes.name: Bheem Takes the Cake
episodes.overview: When Bheem and Kalia are left alone with some cake batter, will they stir up something delicious -- or disastrous?

episodes.name: The Bull Fighter
episodes.overview: It's Bheem against an angry bull. But he isn't interested in fighting; he just wants to have some fun!

episodes.name: Sleep Crawling
episodes.overview: It may be naptime, but from riding unicorns to battling sea creatures, Bheem's having a wild adventure in his dreams!

episodes.name: Bheem's Masterpiece
episodes.overview: Bheem and Kalia break a sculpture that's meant for an important guest. Will their quick fix be a wreck ... or a piece of art?

episodes.name: A Birthday Surprise
episodes.overview: A lion is scheming to trap Bheem for his next meal. Little does he know, Bheem's got better plans!

episodes.name: A Dogsitter’s Nightmare
episodes.overview: When his babysitter falls asleep, Bheem befriends an adorable pup ... but this pooch is even more mischievous than he is!

episodes.name: Kalia vs Scarecrow
episodes.overview: Kalia believes that a scarecrow has eaten Bheem! Can he set his fears aside to battle the straw-stuffed enemy?

episodes.name: Bheem's New Tooth
episodes.overview: What’s the best teething toy for a baby with the strength of a Titan? Bheem’s babysitter is about to find out!

episodes.name: Kalia and the Carrots
episodes.overview: When a hungry Kalia refuses to eat a healthy snack, Bheem tries to convince him to give it a try.

episodes.name: A Day with a Peacock
episodes.overview: A beautiful peacock has had one of her most important feathers stolen! Now it’s up to Bheem to retrieve it — or replace it.

episodes.name: Tiger Trouble
episodes.overview: Bheem comes to the aid of a baby tiger stuck in a tree, but is he prepared for the cub’s much larger parent?

episodes.name: Bheem’s Monsoon Monday
episodes.overview: Bheem will do anything to keep the monsoon rain clouds away. But maybe they're not so bad after all.

episodes.name: Titli’s Arts and Crafts Day
episodes.overview: While playing with Titli’s bottle of glue, Bheem causes a sticky mess — then gets a smart idea!

episodes.name: Grand Indian Wedding
episodes.overview: As friends celebrate a wedding, a jealous Bheem is anything but pleased and will stop at nothing to wreak havoc at the event!

episodes.name: A Day at the Marketplace
episodes.overview: From loading trucks to taming angry chickens, Bheem’s superhuman strength and quick thinking come in handy at the market.

episodes.name: Bheem at the Playground
episodes.overview: Kalia won’t let any animal friends into the new park. Can Bheem show him that playtime is for everyone?

episodes.name: A Trip to the Moon
episodes.overview: A game of catch with the moon turns into a magical overnight adventure as Bheem heads to the skies to meet his new playmate!

episodes.name: Buttery Bheem
episodes.overview: An accidental fall into a block of greasy butter sends Bheem slipping and sliding into some unexpected fun!

episodes.name: Kalia the Wrestler
episodes.overview: When Kalia faces a much larger opponent at a wrestling match, Bheem steps into the ring to lend a helping hand.

episodes.name: Bheem’s Snow Day
episodes.overview: On a snowy winter day, Bheem helps a jolly visitor out of a tough spot — and learns that dreams really can come true.
